tool_description:
TCS’ Cloud Messaging Center REST API allows developers to easily integrate SMS/Text messaging into their applications and web services. We offer two-way text messaging coverage for all US wireless carriers. The Cloud Messaging Center (CMC) REST API provides a set of methods that are called using https or http, to perform messaging (SMS) features such as… 
•	Sending a message 
•	Getting delivery receipts 
•	Replying to a message 
•	Creating contacts and groups 
•	Scheduling messages
name: TCS Cloud Messaging
title: TCS Cloud Messaging

api_list.name: Schedule an event
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sms.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/schedules"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Send Message
api_list.description: Allows authorized users to send messages to handsets and mobile devices using SMS.
api_list.code:
